lead_paragraph: From Joseph Plambeck at Media Decoder:
snippet: Buzzmedia, which now owns three dozen music and celebrity sites, is betting that the real moneymaking opportunity on the Internet is in the deep dive, publishing endlessly about topics that lots of people care about.
abstract: Buzzmedia, which now owns three dozen music and celebrity sites, is betting that the real moneymaking opportunity on the Internet is in the deep dive, publishing endlessly about topics that lots of people care about.
